reporter_caption.center: MAXEY v. GREAT ATLANTIC AND PACIFIC TEA COMPANY, 113 N.J. 662 (1988)

caption.center: TERRY MAXEY AND SONDRA MAXEY v. GREAT ATLANTIC AND PACIFIC TEA COMPANY, ET

opinion.opinion_text:
Leave to appeal granted, and it is further
ORDERED that the motion for summary reversal of the order of the Superior Court, Law Division, is granted.
Jurisdiction is not retained.Page 663
